examples.en: We're merely good friends.
He formed no friends.
We remained friends.
He met both friends.
Friends have forsaken her.
Britain's friends and foes
He never wants for friends.
examples.ru: У него всегда было много друзей.

examples.en: We are friends of the family.
His friends played him false.
My friends have all gone gray.
examples.ru: Все мои друзья уже стали седыми.

examples.en: He dropped all his old friends.
examples.ru: Он бросил всех своих старых друзей.

examples.en: I don't approve of your friends.
Most of his friends are drinkers.
Many of my friends are Christian.
She waved to her friends.
He forgot his old friends.
Never shop on your friends.
examples.ru: Никогда не доноси на своих друзей.

examples.en: He had influential friends.
She has millions of friends.
I rate him among my friends.
examples.ru: Я считаю его своим другом. / Я причисляю его к своим друзьям.

examples.en: He lords it over his friends.
We were friends from then on.
His friends are a strange lot.
They were friends from then on.
examples.ru: С тех пор они стали друзьями /подружились/.

examples.en: They are friends of the library.
I wish we could be best friends.
examples.ru: Мне бы хотелось, чтобы мы стали близкими друзьями.

examples.en: I think how we were once friends.
examples.ru: Я вспоминаю о том, как мы когда-то дружили.

examples.en: Her former friends now avoid her.
examples.ru: Её прежние друзья теперь избегают её.

examples.en: We like our friends to be honest.
examples.ru: Мы хотим, чтобы наши друзья были честными.

examples.en: She was able to bunk with friends.
